text:
I did a big overhaul of my Services page on my portfolio (<https://www.danihenion.com/services/>), but I'm struggling with what to offer in each "package." Some freelance friends in another group suggested having one for strategy, one for writing, and one for both.

The third option is the one I want to go after the most, though--full-service management of a company's content creation. I already have a client who has their own writers, but they hired me to manage the workflow, edit the writers' work, publish content, and promote the pieces. I'd love to get more contracts like that. Eventually, I'd also like to add services for landing page creation and on-page SEO.

Should I change the scope of the packages I have listed? Should I add additional packages?

Any and all feedback welcome :slightly_smiling_face:
